#summary Arithmetic Operators

=Arithmetic Operators=

===Addition===
{{{
     x = 0 + 1
     x += 1
}}}

===Subtraction===
{{{
     x = 0 - 1
     x -= 1
}}}

===Multiplication===
{{{
     x = 0 * 1
     x *= 1
}}}

===Division===
{{{
     x = 0 / 1
     x /= 1
}}}

===Modulus===
{{{
     x = 0 % 1
     x %= 1
}}}
